def turn(state):
    # New question.
    results = []
    for x, y in get2idxs(idxs):
        check_xy_close = all_close([x, y], ctx)
        check_xy_small = all([is_small(dot, ctx) for dot in [x, y]])
        check_xy_same_size = same_size([x, y], ctx)
        check_xy_diagonal = (
            are_above_left([x], [y], ctx) or are_above_right([x], [y], ctx)
            or are_below_left([x], [y], ctx) or are_below_right([x], [y], ctx)
        )
        if (
            check_xy_close
            and check_xy_small
            and check_xy_same_size
            and check_xy_diagonal
        ):
            results.append([x, y])
    return results

def turn(state):
    # New question.
    results = []
    for x, y, z in get3idxs(idxs):
        check_xyz_triangle = is_triangle([x, y, z], ctx)
        check_x_dark = is_dark(x, ctx)
        check_x_large = is_large(x, ctx)
        check_yz_light = all([is_light(dot, ctx) for dot in [y, z]])
        check_yz_small = all([is_small(dot, ctx) for dot in [y, z]])
        if (
            check_xyz_triangle
            and check_x_dark
            and check_x_large
            and check_yz_light
            and check_yz_small
        ):
            results.append([x, y, z])
    return results
state = turn(state)
